about_the_game:
Dive into the chilling depths of the Backrooms in this first-person survival horror game for PC. Featuring immersive bodycam gameplay and tight controls, players navigate an endless maze of disorienting corridors filled with atmospheric tension. Randomized environments ensure that every experience is unique, adding to the sense of unease and unpredictability. Your mission is to explore and catch anomalies, all while trying to escape the eerie and mysterious halls.

Key Features:

  • Bodycam Gameplay: Experience the Backrooms through a unique, immersive bodycam perspective, intensifying the sense of realism and tension.

  • Randomized Levels: No two runs are the same, with endless corridors and unpredictable pathways keeping you on edge.

  • Tight Controls: Designed for responsive gameplay, ensuring you have precise movement as you explore and survive.

  • Atmospheric Horror: An unsettling environment with eerie lighting, endless yellow hallways, and haunting soundscapes.

Will you find your way out, or will you be consumed by the unknown?

name: The Backrooms: Anomaly Containment Unit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 from around 2016 or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 or newer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 7 from 2018 or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or newer

short_description: A first-person horror game with bodycam gameplay and tight controls. Explore the eerie, randomly generated Backrooms, catch anomalies, solve puzzles, and face atmospheric horror. Survive endless corridors in this intense PC survival experience.
